synopsis.text:
Young Ashibe, an endearing first-grader, and his peculiar yet lovable pet seal, Goma-chan, take center stage in this delightful anime adaptation of Morishita Hiromi's 4-panel comic strip from Young Jump. Originally serialized in 1988 and making its animated debut in 1991, this charming tale has captured hearts and sparked a spotted seal craze.

Join Ashibe and Goma-chan in their daily escapades as they navigate the trials and tribulations of school, family, and neighborhood life. This heartwarming and sometimes bizarre comedy offers a glimpse into the unique friendship between a lively boy and his extraordinary pet, creating a captivating and amusing narrative that appeals to all ages. Prepare for a delightful adventure filled with laughter, warmth, and a touch of the unexpected in this enchanting anime.
